# Case study

## Import

```{r}
library(data.table)
bank <- fread("bank-full.csv")

set.seed(123)
n <- nrow(bank)
bank_scrambled <- bank[sample(1:n),]
train <- bank_scrambled[1:floor(0.7*n),]
test <- bank_scrambled[(floor(0.7*n)+1):n,]

library(rpart)
tree <- rpart(y ~ ., train, method = "class")

library(rattle)
library(rpart.plot)
library(RColorBrewer)
fancyRpartPlot(tree)

pred <- predict(tree, test, type = "class")
conf <- table(test$y, pred)
print(sum(diag(conf)) / sum(conf))

```
